Meeting Of The Minds.definition: assent to the mutually agreed upon and understood terms of an agreement by the parties to a contract that may be manifest by objective signs of intent
Meeting Of The Minds.origin: [the parties had not reached a meeting of the minds , and they did not have a specifically enforceable agreement " Franklin v. Stern , 858 P.2d 142 (1993) (dissent)"]
